actions.name: War Pick
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Blindness (2nd-Level; V)
actions.desc: A creature within 30 feet makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  the target is blinded for 1 minute. It repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns  ending the effect on a success.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
special_abilities.desc: The scout has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing or sight.

special_abilities.name: Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The scout has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

special_abilities.name: Deep Gnome Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The scout has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

special_abilities.name: Deep Gnome Magic
special_abilities.desc: The deep gnome can innately cast blindness/deafness (blindness only), disguise self, and nondetection once per long rest without using material components, using Intelligence for their spellcasting ability.
